Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning
Tyler O'Neill hit a walk-off homer for Boston, which helped the Orioles lose 5-3 in 10 innings at Fenway Park
Post-Match Reflections: New York took two of three in a series between playoff contenders
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees increased their AL East lead to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore
The Royals fell 4 1/2 games behind first-place Cleveland in the AL Central but hold the league's second wild card by 1 1/2 games over Minnesota
Others: Juan Soto launched a go-ahead homer in the sixth for the Yankees
Salvador Perez hit a tying sacrifice fly off Clay Holmes in the seventh and started an impressive double play to end the bottom half
RHP Michael Lorenzen (strained left hamstring) will make his next minor league rehab start this weekend and could return to the rotation next week
